ladder.api 0.0.1
  • Reference

AffineTransform Object

AffineTransform.Rd

AffineTransform Object

Usage

AffineTransform(
  scaleX = NULL,
  scaleY = NULL,
  shearX = NULL,
  shearY = NULL,
  translateX = NULL,
  translateY = NULL,
  unit = NULL
)

Arguments

scaleX

(number) The X coordinate scaling element.

scaleY

(number) The Y coordinate scaling element.

shearX

(number) The X coordinate shearing element.

shearY

(number) The Y coordinate shearing element.

translateX

(number) The X coordinate translation element.

translateY

(number) The Y coordinate translation element.

unit

(string) The units for translate elements.

  • UNIT_UNSPECIFIED: The units are unknown.

  • EMU: An English Metric Unit (EMU) is defined as 1/360,000 of a centimeter and thus there are 914,400 EMUs per inch, and 12,700 EMUs per point.

  • PT: A point, 1/72 of an inch.

Value

AffineTransform object

Details

AffineTransform uses a 3x3 matrix with an implied last row of [ 0 0 1 ] to transform source coordinates (x,y) into destination coordinates (x', y') according to: x' x = shear_y scale_y translate_y 1 [ 1 ] After transformation, x' = scale_x * x + shear_x * y + translate_x; y' = scale_y * y + shear_y * x + translate_y; This message is therefore composed of these six matrix elements.
